        public void sendMessage(BristleMessage message,
               Object serialization,
               List<WebsocketConnector> connectors)
                 throws Exception
        Sends a message with serialization information and list of recipients provided.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent.
        serialization - serialization information.
        connectors - list of recipients.
        Throws:
        Exception - serialization exceptions.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(BristleMessage message,
               SendCondition sendCondition)
                 throws Exception
        Sends a message using default serialization information. Recipients are determined by evaluating SendCondition object.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent.
        sendCondition - condition object used to determine recipients.
        Throws:
        Exception - serialization exceptions.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(BristleMessage message,
               List<UserContext> recipients)
                 throws Exception
        Sends a message using default serialization information to specified recipients.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent.
        recipients - list of recipients.
        Throws:
        Exception - serialization exceptions.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(BristleMessage message,
               SendCondition sendCondition,
               List<UserContext> recipients)
                 throws Exception
        Sends a message using default serialization information. Recipients are determined by evaluating SendCondition object, where the initial pool is passed as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be sent.
        sendCondition - condition object used to determine recipients.
        recipients - initial pool of recipients, for further processing by condition object.
        Throws:
        Exception - serialization exceptions.

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(UserContext user)
        Sends a connection closing message to given user.
        Parameters:
        user - user to which the connection should be closed.

      • closeConnections

        public void closeConnections(SendCondition sendCondition)
        Sends a connection closing message to all users determined by evaluating passed condition object.
        Parameters:
        sendCondition - condition object used to determine list of users to which the connection should be closed.

      • closeConnections

        public void closeConnections(List<UserContext> users)
        Sends a connection closing message to the list of users.
        Parameters:
        users - users to which the connection should be closed.
